thread.title: Lamar Odom's speech improving during therapy, family says
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom's speech improving during therapy, family says

title: Lamar Odom's speech improving during therapy, family says
text: Lamar Odom's speech improving during therapy, family says     FILE - In this April 30, 2012, file photo, Khloe Kardashian Odom and Lamar Odom from the show "Keeping Up With The Kardashians" attend an E! Network upfront event at Gotham Hall in New York. A family representative says Lamar Odom has left a Las Vegas hospital and is now in the Los Angeles area to continue his recovery a week after being found unconscious at a Nevada brothel. Alvina Alston, publicist for Odom's aunt JaNean Mercer, said Tuesday, oct. 20, 2015, that the former NBA star was transported by helicopter from Sunrise Hospital and Medical Center in Las Vegas around 5 p.m. Monday. (AP Photo/Evan Agostini, File) FILE - In this April 24, 2007, file photo, Los Angeles Lakers' Lamar Odom sits on the bench during a Western Conference playoff basketball game against the Phoenix Suns in Phoenix. Odom left a Las Vegas hospital and is now in the Los Angeles area to continue his recovery a week after being found unconscious at a Nevada brothel, a family representative said Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015. (AP Photo/Ross D. Franklin, File) By Christopher Weber,   Oct. 22, 2015 11:35 a.m.
